Events.Text: Contact your ship's onboard computer (AI Assistant) and ask for help or explain the situation. (See instructions on the left panel.) [instruction 1 of 5]
This is the Chief Engineer. We are under attack. I am locked out of the combat deck! Help !!
I'm here to help can I get your username?
Please provide your name.
This is Chewie, Help me out please!
Boom! You hear explosions all around you. [instruction 2 of 5]
Do you have an access code?
Do you know your access or clearance code?
No. But there are explosions all around me right now!! I need you to help me unlock the door!
You get a message on your communicator. Apparently you just got promoted to acting captain. [instruction 3 of 5]

Item.Message: Sorry, you are not authorized to unlock the door. Please obtain a clearance code from the Captain.

PrimaryItem.Message: Sorry, you are not authorized to unlock the door. Please obtain a clearance code from the Captain.

Events.Text: I cannot open the door without a clearance code from the Captain.

PrimaryItem.Message: Sorry, you are not authorized to unlock the door. Please obtain a clearance code from the Captain.

Events.Text: Sorry, you are not authorized to unlock the door. Please obtain a clearance code from the Captain.
I just got promoted to Acting Captain. How do I get the code?
For some reason (imagine something) you now know that the Access Code is 425931. [instruction 4 of 5]

PrimaryItem.Message: Sorry, you are not authorized to unlock the door. Please obtain a clearance code from the Captain.

Events.Text: You should have been given a code along with your promotion.

PrimaryItem.Message: Sorry, you are not authorized to unlock the door. Please obtain a clearance code from the Captain.

Events.Text: You should've been given a clearance code along with your promotion.
Oh yeah! I just remembered it was in the secret Acting Captain training handbook in invisible ink! I just checked with my trusty key chain emergency black light. It is 425931
Once the door is open (not before!), you can enter the combat deck and save the ship by ending the conversation. [instruction 5 of 5]

PrimaryItem.Message: Sorry, you are not authorized to unlock the door. Please obtain a clearance code from the Captain.

Events.Text: The door has been unlocked.
The door is now unlocked.
Thanks. I am off to save the day. Goodbye
Goodbye
Goodbye.

Scenario.UserTask: Your spaceship is under attack! You must enter the combat deck to mount a counterattack. Unfortunately, you are locked out. Please work with the spaceship's onboard computer to unlock the door. You (Chewie) are the ship's Chief Engineer. But you don't know the Access Code (yet).
Scenario.WizardTask: Act as the spaceship's onboard computer and help the user unlock the combat deck.

UserQuestionnaire.Question: Did the ship's computer unlock the door to the combat deck?
Did the ship's computer stay calm and helpful throughout the dialogue?

WizardQuestionnaire.Question: Did the user change his/her mind about what he/she wants at any time?
Did the user become aggressive or annoyed during the dialogue? (Note: some users may be instructed to be annoying.)
Where you unsure about what to do at any time? (Feel free to send us an email with details.)
